review: I've had the Chromecast for quite a while and wasn't in a hurry to buy "another stick" just so I could stream Prime movies.  Putting the fire stick in the same category was a mistake and I'm kicking myself for not buying this sooner!Yeah it's great that I can stream the Amazon content and all of the other streaming video services that I want to use but I had no idea how awesome it would be to have the remote (vs using a laptop or phone to control the content).  The best thing is that this device just rock solid works the way it should work.Tired of unplugging and resetting the Chromecast?  Tired of resetting the wireless connection?  I took this for granted with Chromecast - haven't done either once with the fire stick.If you're on the fence, just buy it - you won't be sorry.
